languages.text: "Древняя преступная организация, берущая начало с первых поселенцев сектора Каликсис. Ей заправляют теневые кланы, возглавляемые преступными баронами. Перейдете им дорогу — и рискуете нажить врагов по всему Простору Коронус. Или даже {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}. Ну а исполнители — просто бесстыдные, алчные до наживы мрази".

traits.locale_text: "Древняя преступная организация, берущая начало с первых поселенцев сектора Каликсис. Ей заправляют теневые кланы, возглавляемые преступными баронами. Перейдете им дорогу — и рискуете нажить врагов по всему Простору Коронус. Или даже {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}. Ну а исполнители — просто бесстыдные, алчные до наживы мрази".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."
languages.original_text: "Древняя преступная организация, берущая начало с первых поселенцев сектора Каликсис. Ей заправляют теневые кланы, возглавляемые преступными баронами. Перейдете им дорогу — и рискуете нажить врагов по всему Простору Коронус. Или даже {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}. Ну а исполнители — просто бесстыдные, алчные до наживы мрази".

traits.locale_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “那是个古老的犯罪集团，起源于卡利西斯星区的第一批定居者。这个集团由阴影中的氏族组成，由强盗男爵掌舵。如果你惹上了他们，你就可能会在科罗努斯扩区中四面树敌，甚至可能连整个{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}境内都是你的敌人。至于他们的代理人，那些人不过是一群无耻、贪婪的人渣。”
languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

traits.locale_text: “那是个古老的犯罪集团，起源于卡利西斯星区的第一批定居者。这个集团由阴影中的氏族组成，由强盗男爵掌舵。如果你惹上了他们，你就可能会在科罗努斯扩区中四面树敌，甚至可能连整个{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}境内都是你的敌人。至于他们的代理人，那些人不过是一群无耻、贪婪的人渣。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers in the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire Imperium. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

languages.text: «Una antigua organización criminal que nació de los primeros colonos del sector Calixis. La controlan clanes ocultos con barones ladrones al mando. Quien se interpone en su camino se arriesga a ganarse enemigos por toda la Extensión de Koronus, o incluso por todo el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. En cuanto a sus agentes, no son más que escoria descarada y codiciosa».
languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

traits.locale_text: «Una antigua organización criminal que nació de los primeros colonos del sector Calixis. La controlan clanes ocultos con barones ladrones al mando. Quien se interpone en su camino se arriesga a ganarse enemigos por toda la Extensión de Koronus, o incluso por todo el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. En cuanto a sus agentes, no son más que escoria descarada y codiciosa».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「キャリクシス星域の最初の入植者に端を発する古代の犯罪カルテルさ。強盗男爵を頂点とする影の一族によって運営されているんだ。彼らに逆らえば、コロヌス・エクスパンス全域、あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}全体すらも敵に回す危険がある。そこのエージェントは、恥知らずで強欲なクズばかりさ」
languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

traits.locale_text: 「キャリクシス星域の最初の入植者に端を発する古代の犯罪カルテルさ。強盗男爵を頂点とする影の一族によって運営されているんだ。彼らに逆らえば、コロヌス・エクスパンス全域、あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}全体すらも敵に回す危険がある。そこのエージェントは、恥知らずで強欲なクズばかりさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ein uraltes Verbrecherkartell, das auf die ersten Siedler im Calixis-Sektor zurückgeht. Es wird von zwielichtigen Clans geleitet, denen Räuberbarone vorstehen. Wer ihnen in die Quere kommt, der riskiert, sich in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung Feinde zu machen, vielleicht sogar im gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Was die Agenten angeht, die sind schlicht schamloser, gieriger Abschaum."
languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

traits.locale_text: "Ein uraltes Verbrecherkartell, das auf die ersten Siedler im Calixis-Sektor zurückgeht. Es wird von zwielichtigen Clans geleitet, denen Räuberbarone vorstehen. Wer ihnen in die Quere kommt, der riskiert, sich in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung Feinde zu machen, vielleicht sogar im gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Was die Agenten angeht, die sind schlicht schamloser, gieriger Abschaum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est un cartel très ancien qui remonte à l'époque de l'arrivée des premiers colons dans le secteur Calixis. Il est dirigé par des clans secrets dont les rênes sont aux mains de barons du crime. Si vous vous mettez en travers de son chemin, vous risquez de vous faire des ennemis dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus, voire dans l'ensemble de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Quant à ses agents, ce n'est qu'un ramassis de salopards cupides qui n'ont aucun scrupule. »
languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un cartel très ancien qui remonte à l'époque de l'arrivée des premiers colons dans le secteur Calixis. Il est dirigé par des clans secrets dont les rênes sont aux mains de barons du crime. Si vous vous mettez en travers de son chemin, vous risquez de vous faire des ennemis dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus, voire dans l'ensemble de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Quant à ses agents, ce n'est qu'un ramassis de salopards cupides qui n'ont aucun scrupule. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Kökleri Calixis Sektörü'nün ilk yerleşimcilerine dayanan, çok eski bir suç kartelidir. Başlarında soyguncu baronlar bulunan karanlık klanlarca yönetilir. Yollarına çıkarsan tüm Koronus Enginliği'ne, hatta komple {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'a{/g} dağılmış bir düşman edinme riskini almış olursun. Ajanları da utanmak nedir bilmez, açgözlü şerefsizlerdir."
languages.original_text: "An ancient crime cartel that originated with the first settlers of the Calixis Sector. It is run by shadowy clans with robber barons at the helm. Cross their path, and you risk making enemies all over the Koronus Expanse, or even the entire {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. As for the agents, they are just shameless, greedy scum."

traits.locale_text: "Kökleri Calixis Sektörü'ne ilk yerleşen kişilere dayanan, çok eski bir suç karteli. Başlarında soyguncu baronlar bulunan karanlık klanlarca yönetilir. Yollarına çıkarsan tüm Koronus Enginliği'ne, hatta komple {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'a dağılmış bir düşman edinme riskini almış olursun. Ajanları da utanmak nedir bilmez, açgözlü şerefsizlerdir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
